instruction: Generate a theme song for a movie about a police officer.
output:
Verse 1
Take to the streets and spread the news
He's the one that keeps us safe and sound
Her badge will show they must comply
Her justice and courage can't be denied

Chorus
A hero, a cop, and faithful protectors
Loyal to the mission, her service won't be forgotten
Her mission is justice, in battle she won't relent
Fighting for justice and protecting the innocent

Verse 2
Risking her life to protect us all
Wisdom and courage, she will never fall
Against evil doers, she rises to the call
With courage and grace, she stands so tall

Chorus
A hero, a cop, and faithful protectors
Loyal to the mission, her service won't be forgotten
Her mission is justice, in battle she won't relent
Fighting for justice and protecting the innocent

Bridge
Shedding light in the darkness, never fear
Bringing justice, with courage, her determination is clear
And we are safe, for she is here
A hero, a cop, and faithful protectors

Chorus
A hero, a cop, and faithful protectors
Loyal to the mission, her service won't be forgotten
Her mission is justice, in battle she won't relent
Fighting for justice and protecting the innocent
